name: The Travelling Merchant
description:
Game Bio:

You're a merchant, struggling to make ends meet due to the ongoing war. When it comes to an end, opportunity comes knocking. You're not going to let a little thing like danger to your person stop the march of captialism when there's money to be made!

Background:

This branching text-based narrative can end in a number of ways. I used Twine and the basic-scripting language Harlowe to create the final piece. If I can partner with an artist in the future I hope to bundle this into a small indie anthology piece with similar stories.
